body_html:
I encounter same problem with exact same error message. I have Windows 8.1, VS 2017 Community edition and build tools v15.8.4. I checked PyTorch repo yesterday and update all git submodules. I have CUDA 9.2 installed too.

In ArrayRef.h line 152 is used macro:

AT_CHECK(
        N + M <= size(),
        "ArrayRef: invalid slice, N = ",
        N,
        "; M = ",
        M,
        "; size = ",
        size());

So condition

N + M <= size()

isn't satisfied because of error message, but I don't know why.

body:
I encounter same problem with exact same error message. I have Windows 8.1, VS 2017 Community edition and build tools v15.8.4. I checked PyTorch repo yesterday and update all git submodules. I have CUDA 9.2 installed too.

In ArrayRef.h line 152 is used macro:
```
AT_CHECK(
        N + M <= size(),
        "ArrayRef: invalid slice, N = ",
        N,
        "; M = ",
        M,
        "; size = ",
        size());
```

So condition
```
N + M <= size()
```
isn't satisfied because of error message, but I don't know why.
